label: 大唐六典
対訳語: Laws and Customs of the Great Tang. (Ch. Da Tang liu dian)
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: An eighth century Chinese text describing the government organization and official duties of the Tang-dynasty courtiers. It formed a model for many of the eighth-century Japanese rituals.
